description: This rich and flavoursome loaf is packed with goodness and is delicious hot or cold.
name: Lentil "Meatloaf" Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium onion, peeled and finely diced

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 200Â°C. Toss the sliced sweet potato in half of the oil and roast for 20 minutes.
Heat the rest of the oil in a large pan on medium heat and cook the onions and mushrooms for 6-7 minutes, stir in the lentils, garlic, soy sauce, thyme and walnuts and cook for 2 minutes.
Tip the roasted sweet potato, mushroom mix and oats into a food processor and blitz to a coarse mix with some texture left.
Spoon into a lined loaf tin and bake for 40 minutes. Spread tomato sauce on top and return to the oven for 15 minutes. Remove from the loaf tin, slice and serve.
